|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM3390;BCM3390ZKFSBG, TA1620 P20, 594131-85 N3 W; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 1.5 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF2G18AC-XKI; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646E-BCNB; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |cm_down_c = 32 |cm_up_c = 8 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:90:00, 1C:B0:44, B4:EE:B4 |oui = 00:10:18, 1C:B0:44, B4:EE:B4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.1, acqam, 256QAM, VHT160, ZigBee, Bluetooth, MU-MIMO, DFS (master), |addchip = WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85310-11;SKY11, 85310, 629EM;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.100.1 |defaultlogin = user |defaultpass = user |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/03/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG, UE1636 P30, 622548-21 3; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = 2200 |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG, UE1702 P30, 216-13 3; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :''Embedded Media Terminal Adapter (EMTA)'' :''Zigbee, BT and 802.11ac Dual-Band Concurrent''
"Zero wait DFS and DSP-based Spectrum capture"
* DOCSIS 3.1 dual 192Mhz downstream OFDM plus 32 SC-QAM channels * DOCSIS 3.1 dual 96Mhz upstream OFDM plus 8 SC-WAM channels
This device was originally submitted to the FCC on 05/09/2017. :On 08/16/2017, Askey submitted a [https://fccid.io/H8NTCG310/Letter/Dismissal-Letter-3512001 Dismissal Letter] to request that this FCC grant be dismissed with the message below.
The device was then re-submitted on 10/03/2017. :"We would like FCC to dismiss the grant of this FCC ID ASAP, due to device Hardware and Software design will be changed, to improve the WiFi throughput and performance."
==Links of Interest== [http://www.askey.com.tw/pdf/TCG310-J.pdf Datasheet]
==See also== :[[Askey]] • [http://www.askey.com.tw/wireless.html Wireless] • [http://www.askey.com.tw/broadband.html Gateways] *[[Askey RT5010W]] - ''802.11ax High Performance WiFi Router'' *[[Askey RT4230W]] - ''Puma WiFi Router'' (Wave 2 4x4) *[[Askey RT4220W]] - ''Cube Router'' (802.11ac 2x2) *[[Askey RTF3505VW-GV]] - ''GPON Home Gateway'' *[[Askey RTF8105VW]] - ''GPON Home Gateway'' *[[Askey RTV7736VW]] - ''VDSL Home Gateway'' *[[Askey RTV1928VW]] - ''High Performance Internet Box'' *[[Askey STI9040]] - MoCA WiFi Router :[http://www.askey.com.tw/tv.html Set-Top Boxes & Cable Modems] *[[Askey STI6130]] - UHD Android TV Dongle *[[Askey STI6030]] - Netﬂix UHD Android TV Box *[[Askey STI1130]] (H.265 HEVC) - HD HEVC IP STB *[[Askey STI1120]] (H.264) - HD HEVC IP STB *[[Askey STC8030]] - HD DVB-S2/T2/C PVR STB *[[Askey STC2110]] - D3.1 Cable Gateway/UHD STB *[[Askey STS2060]] - UHD IPTV/DVB Android TV STB :Cable Modems *[[Askey TCG310]] (-J) - D3.1 WiFi EMTA Cable Modem *[[Askey TCG300]] - D3.0 24x8 WiFi EMTA Cable Modem *[[Askey TCG220]] - D3.0 8x4 WiFi EMTA Cable Modem *[[Askey TCG220-x]] - D3.0 16x4 WiFi EMTA Cable Modem *[[Askey TCG220-d]] - D3.0 8x4 Data Cable Modem
